languages.text: "Не лучший первый контакт с обитателями мира. Надеюсь, мы найдем кого-то более подходящего для беседы — добровольной или нет".
"Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."
languages.original_text: "Не лучший первый контакт с обитателями мира. Надеюсь, мы найдем кого-то более подходящего для беседы — добровольной или нет".

traits.locale_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."
"Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."
"Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."
"Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

languages.text: “我们已经和这个世界的居民打过交道了，结果算不上太好。我希望能找到更多可以进行对话的人，无论他们愿不愿意开口。”
languages.original_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经和这个世界的居民打过交道了，结果算不上太好。我希望能找到更多可以进行对话的人，无论他们愿不愿意开口。”

languages.text: «No ha sido el mejor primer contacto con los habitantes de este mundo. Espero que encontremos a alguien más capacitado para mantener una conversación... voluntaria o no».
languages.original_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

traits.locale_text: «No ha sido el mejor primer contacto con los habitantes de este mundo. Espero que encontremos a alguien más capacitado para mantener una conversación... voluntaria o no».

languages.text: 「この惑星の住民との最初の接触としては、ベストではありません。意思の有無にかかわらず、もっと会話が成立する相手が見つかるといいのだが…」
languages.original_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星の住民との最初の接触としては、ベストではありません。意思の有無にかかわらず、もっと会話が成立する相手が見つかるといいのだが…」

languages.text: "Nicht der beste Erstkontakt mit den Einwohnern der Welt. Hoffentlich finden wir jemanden, der besser für ein Gespräch taugt – freiwillig oder nicht."
languages.original_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht der beste Erstkontakt mit den Einwohnern der Welt. Hoffentlich finden wir jemanden, der besser für ein Gespräch taugt – freiwillig oder nicht."

languages.text: « Notre premier contact avec les habitants de ce monde laisse quelque peu à désirer. J'espère que nous trouverons quelqu'un qui sera capable de discuter avec nous... volontairement ou non. »
languages.original_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

traits.locale_text: « Notre premier contact avec les habitants de ce monde laisse quelque peu à désirer. J'espère que nous trouverons quelqu'un qui sera capable de discuter avec nous... volontairement ou non. »

languages.text: "Dünya sakinleriyle ilk temasımız pek hoş olmadı. Umarım konuşmayı daha iyi becerebilen birilerini bulabiliriz. Bulalım da... Konuşturmak kolay."
languages.original_text: "Not the best first contact with the world's inhabitants. I hope we will find someone more able to hold a conversation — willingly or not."

traits.locale_text: “Dünya sakinleriyle ilk temasımız pek hoş olmadı. Umarım konuşmayı daha iyi becerebilen birilerini bulabiliriz. Bulalım da... Konuşturmak kolay.”
